content: प्रच्छद् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To cover, wrap up, veil, envelope; (वनं) प्राच्छादयदमेयात्मा नीहारेणेव चंद्रमाः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To hide, conceal, disguise, keep secret; प्रच्छादय स्वान् गुणान् <ls>Bh. 2. 77</ls>; प्रदानं प्रच्छन्नं <ls n="Bh.">2. 64</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 198</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">10. 40</ls>; <ls>Ch. P. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To clothe oneself, put on clothes. {@--4@} To stand in the way, become an obstacle.
